Title: Wizardry
Description: Wizardry is intended to provide a framework for creating wizards using MVVM in WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Wizardry is intended to provide a framework for creating wizards using MVVM in WPF.

The main project is currently based around using the Prism and Unity frameworks however there are plans to make a generic version that could be used with any desired IoC/DI framework.
